summary: E2E testing of Content Command Centre feature. All 4 tabs (Reel Creator, Share Cards, Career Mantras, Legal Docs) working correctly. Backend APIs (12 tests) all passed. Frontend UI loads correctly with proper navigation from Landing Page.
passed_tests: GET /api/content/status returns correct status with features, languages, templates
GET /api/content/mantra/entrepreneur returns entrepreneur mantra
GET /api/content/mantra/student returns student mantra
GET /api/content/mantra/corporate returns corporate mantra
GET /api/content/mantra/repeater returns career comeback mantra
GET /api/content/mantras lists all mantras by audience
POST /api/content/legal/nda generates NDA document with HTML
POST /api/content/legal/offer generates Offer Letter with salary breakdown
GET /api/content/legal/documents lists legal documents
POST /api/content/translate translates text to multiple Indian languages
POST /api/content/share-card creates DoersScore share card
GET /api/content/segments returns GTM target segments
Content Command Centre page loads at /content route
Reel Creator tab shows 6 templates (My DOERS Journey, Talent Card Reveal, Success Story Spotlight, Career Mantra, New Year Career Wish 2026, 5E Journey Progress)
Reel Creator tab shows multi-lingual message input with 7 language options
Share Cards tab shows DoersScore card form with live preview
Career Mantras tab shows 4 audience segments (Entrepreneurs, Students, Corporate Professionals, Career Comeback)
Legal Docs tab shows NDA Generator and Offer Letter Generator forms
NDA generation works - opens HTML in new tab with success toast
Landing page /welcome has Content Command Centre link with NEW badge
Navigation from Landing Page to /content works correctly
critical_code_review_comments: Content Command Centre implementation is complete and well-structured
All 4 tabs have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Legal document generation (NDA, Offer Letter) creates proper HTML with salary breakdown
Translation API uses Gemini for multi-lingual support with fallback to original text
context_for_next_testing_agent: Content Command Centre is a new GTM feature with 4 tabs: 1) Reel Creator - 6 templates with multi-lingual message input (7 Indian languages), 2) Share Cards - DoersScore card generator with live preview, 3) Career Mantras - 4 audience segments (entrepreneur, student, corporate, repeater) with AI-generated mantras, 4) Legal Docs - NDA and Offer Letter generators that open HTML in new tab. All backend APIs working. Uses Gemini Nano Banana for AI image generation via emergentintegrations library. Landing page has Content Command Centre link with NEW badge.
